pr_title: 4865-mapping-bug: Updated the mapping UI components to use targetEntityId instead of entityName to create mapping artifact.

timeline.message: 4865-mapping-bug: Updated the mapping UI components to use targetEntityId instead of entityName to create mapping artifact.

timeline.bodyText: I'll try this out locally, but I was thinking that the UI needs to populate targetEntityType with entityTypeId instead of entityType too?
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: I just tested this locally - I created a new mapping, and the targetEntityType was correctly set using the entityTypeId.
replies.author: rjrudin
